actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to designate $1 of their income tax liability to be used for purposes of reducing the public debt of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to designate one dollar of their income tax liability to be used for the purpose of reducing the public debt of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to designate $1 of their income tax liability to be used for purposes of reducing the public debt of the United States.
